alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:48AM EDT until June 15 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 1247 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles east of Chattahoochee to near Quincy to 13 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Havana, Florida A and M, Quincy, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Walker Ford Community Center, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, South City, Eight Mile Pond and Griffin Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
